## âœ… Review Complete

I've completed a thorough code review of this PR.

### Checklist
- [x] Read AGENTS.md for project conventions
- [x] Review code quality and ESM conventions
- [x] Review architecture and patterns
- [x] Check security considerations
- [x] Check testing coverage
- [x] Review Discord-specific patterns
- [x] Verify documentation updates
- [x] Submit review verdict

### Verdict: **Approved** âœ…

This PR establishes a solid web dashboard foundation with Next.js 16, Discord OAuth2, and Tailwind v4.

**Key Strengths:**
- Access tokens kept server-side only (not exposed to client)
- NEXTAUTH_SECRET validation rejects weak/placeholder values
- Open redirect protection in login flow
- Security headers configured (HSTS, X-Frame-Options, etc.)
- Rate limit retry logic for Discord API
- Guild pagination for users with 200+ servers
- Graceful degradation when bot API unavailable
- Comprehensive test coverage (14 test files)
- Multi-stage Docker build with health checks

**Minor observations (non-blocking):**
- Bot API response shape could use runtime validation for defense-in-depth
- Proxy middleware relies on SessionGuard for token error handling (acceptable pattern)
